posts.post_content:
Haven't had much luck finding vintage Des Moines/Iowa items lately so I decided to put a T201 set together.  Looking for low to mid grade graded or raw.  No paper loss, writing, torn, etc.  

Pm me with what you are willing to part with.  Only have a handful so far.

Thanks
Craig

Craig, these are the photos of the cards I emailed you about. Thanks, Bob

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=311591&d=1523067292[/IMG]  [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=311592&d=1523067304[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=311593&d=1523067317[/IMG]  [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=311594&d=1523067338[/IMG]

Picked up 15 so far.  Good start on the set but still have a ways to go.  Pm me with what you have.

Thanks
Craig
